statements: SELECT * FROM TradingStrategies;
SELECT strategy_name, buy_threshold, sell_threshold FROM TradingStrategies WHERE stop_loss < 0.5;
SELECT strategy_name FROM TradingStrategies WHERE buy_threshold >= 0.3 AND sell_threshold <= 0.7;
SELECT * FROM TradingStrategies ORDER BY sell_threshold ASC;
SELECT MAX(stop_loss) AS max_stop_loss FROM TradingStrategies;
SELECT * FROM TradingStrategies WHERE strategy_id = 5;
SELECT strategy_name, buy_threshold FROM TradingStrategies WHERE stop_loss < 0.1;
SELECT strategy_name, sell_threshold FROM TradingStrategies WHERE strategy_id IN (3, 6, 9);
SELECT * FROM TradingStrategies WHERE buy_threshold > 0.5 ORDER BY strategy_id DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, buy_threshold, sell_threshold FROM TradingStrategies WHERE strategy_name LIKE '%Trend%';
SELECT * FROM trading_strategies ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT strategy_name, parameters FROM trading_strategies WHERE id = 3;
SELECT strategy_name, parameter_name, parameter_value FROM trading_strategies JOIN strategy_parameters ON trading_strategies.id = strategy_parameters.parameter_id;
SELECT parameter_id, parameter_name, parameter_value FROM strategy_parameters WHERE parameter_value > 100;
SELECT * FROM trading_strategies WHERE strategy_name LIKE '%scalping%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM trading_strategies WHERE id = 1;
SELECT strategy_name, parameters FROM trading_strategies WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY strategy_name DESC;

SELECT trading_strategies.id, trading_strategies.strategy_name, strategy_parameters.parameter_name, strategy_parameters.parameter_value FROM trading_strategies JOIN strategy_parameters ON trading_strategies.id = strategy_parameters.parameter_id WHERE strategy_name LIKE '%trend%' ORDER BY strategy_parameters.parameter_value ASC;

SELECT trading_strategies.strategy_name, strategy_parameters.parameter_name, strategy_parameters.parameter_value FROM trading_strategies RIGHT JOIN strategy_parameters ON trading_strategies.id = strategy_parameters.parameter_id WHERE strategy_parameters.parameter_name = 'stop_loss' OR parameter_name = 'take_profit';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_strategies FROM trading_strategies;
SELECT * FROM trading_strategies
SELECT strategy_name, parameter1 FROM trading_strategies ORDER BY strategy_name ASC
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM strategy_parameters WHERE parameter_value > 0.5
SELECT strategy_id, log_description, log_timestamp FROM strategy_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM trading_strategies WHERE parameter2 < 0.3
SELECT * FROM trading_strategies WHERE parameter1 > 0.5 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT strategy_name, parameter1, parameter2 FROM trading_strategies WHERE id = 2
SELECT s.strategy_name, sp.parameter_name, sp.parameter_value FROM trading_strategies s JOIN strategy_parameters sp ON s.parameter1 = sp.parameter_value WHERE s.id = 1 AND sp.parameter_value > 0.0
SELECT * FROM strategy_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT s.strategy_name, sl.log_description, sl.log_timestamp FROM trading_strategies s JOIN strategy_logs sl ON s.id = sl.strategy_id WHERE s.id IN (1,3) ORDER BY sl.log_timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM trading_strategies;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_parameters FROM trading_strategies ORDER BY strategy_id DESC;
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, trade_symbol, trade_qty, trade_price FROM executed_trades WHERE trade_qty > 100;
SELECT * FROM trade_logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT strategy_name, param_name, param_value FROM strategy_parameters JOIN trading_strategies ON strategy_parameters.strategy_id = trading_strategies.strategy_id ORDER BY strategy_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM trading_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 1;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name FROM trading_strategies WHERE strategy_name LIKE '%Trend%';
SELECT trade_date, trade_symbol, trade_qty, trade_price FROM executed_trades WHERE trade_qty > 100 ORDER BY trade_date DESC;

SELECT trading_strategies.strategy_name, strategy_parameters.param_name, strategy_parameters.param_value FROM trading_strategies JOIN strategy_parameters ON trading_strategies.strategy_id = strategy_parameters.strategy_id WHERE strategy_parameters.param_name = 'Stop Loss';

SELECT trade_logs.log_message, trade_logs.log_timestamp, executed_trades.trade_symbol FROM trade_logs JOIN executed_trades ON trade_logs.trade_id = executed_trades.trade_id WHERE trade_logs.log_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY trade_logs.log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM TradingStrategies;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM TradingStrategies;
SELECT * FROM StrategyParameters WHERE parameter_type = 'Risk';
SELECT account_name, account_balance FROM TradingAccounts ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT strategy_id, trade_date, trade_details->>'symbol' FROM TradeHistory WHERE strategy_id = 'abc123' ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM TradingStrategies WHERE strategy_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT strategy_name, parameter_values FROM TradingStrategies ORDER BY strategy_name DESC;
SELECT account_name, account_balance FROM TradingAccounts WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT strategy_id, account_id, allocation FROM StrategyAccounts WHERE strategy_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY allocation DESC;
SELECT trade_id, strategy_id, trade_date FROM TradeHistory WHERE strategy_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND trade_date >= '2021-01-01';
